name: selos
description: Backoffice retail moderne avec NestJS et Next.js

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:retails"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:retails
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:retails"
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../frontend-retails && npm install
